Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
01.10.2104 GB SCR19184 Extended condition for call create a REPA
12.05.2014 JH SCR18883 Added BID746 Total level RIA pilot
21.03.2014 SH SCR18789 BID741/742/744 Added calc for GNRL_MARKCODMAXCOMMEXCEEDED
06.05.2013 SH SCR18124 BID743 Top10 DSO Prevented 0 devision
29.01.2013 SH SCR17891 BID745 Added test DEBB_ACTINVAH > 0
04.12.2012 JH SCR17746 BID745 Added tasks DSOPAID1 and 2 for populating new database fields CRRD_DSOPAID1 and 2
28.11.2011 SH SCR16852 BID741 Added test CRRR_IPAD = N and CLNT212_RECOURSEONCLIENT =1 to set CRRC_LIMITEXCEEDED = 0
22.11.2011 SH SCR16880 BID741/742 Added calc for GNRL_MARKCODLIMDENIED
09.05.2011 JOH SCR16407 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
12.01.2011 SH SCR16128 BID745 Changed update CRRD_BALANCE (=DEBB_ACTINVAC)
21.12.2010 SH SCR16077 BID745 Added update CRRD_DEBTOR_NUMBER
03.11.2010 SH SCR15831 Added PO.FILE_IPAD and module BID745
-- XML reports for Tamino
-- XML reports for IPAD (no submit)
-- Initially store 12 CRCC rows
... populate the 12 CRRC rows with proper values
... finally add the disputes reasons
-- Set Year/Month to add next CRCC row
-- Set limit exceeded (for markcode limit "exceeded" and "denied" and "Exceeding maximum commitment")
-- Always 10 CRRC rows have to be stored with CRRC_MONTH values 1-10, perhaps
not always 10 CMDI rows are present
-- Add missing CRRC rows with CRRC_MONTH values 1-10 if not already exist, see
end task condition
... set CRRD_LEGALCOLLECTION
... set CRRD_FINANCETIMEEXCEEDED
... set CRRD_LIMITEXCEEDED (for markcode limit "exceeded" and "denied" and "Exceeding maximum commitment"
... set CRRD_DISPUTES

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC * (days(':4') - days(INVO_MARKCODESPECDATE))) / sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALC <> 0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC * (days(':3') - days(INVO_INVDATE))) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 for fetch only
select cast(sum(DCDE_FACTORINGACCOUNTH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DCDE where DCDE_DEBC_NO = :2 and days(DCDE_DATE) >= days(':3') for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AINITIALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and days(INVO_INVDATE) >= days(':3') and INVO_SCHEDULEDATE is not null for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :3 and INVO_DISPUTEREASON = :4 for fetch only

select cast(sum(CRRD_BALANCE) as decimal(13,2)), CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER, min(CRRD_HADR_NAME1), min(CRRD_HADR_CITY), min(CRRD_HADR_COUNTRY) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 group by CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER order by sum(CRRD_BALANCE) desc for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store max. 10 rows with highest sum(CRRD_BALANCE)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CRRD_FINANCETIMEEXCEEDED) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CRRD_DISPUTES) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CRRD_DSO1) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CRRD_DSO2) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only

select cast(sum(CRRD_FINANCETIMEEXCEEDED) as decimal(13,2)), CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER, min(CRRD_HADR_NAME1), min(CRRD_HADR_CITY), min(CRRD_HADR_COUNTRY) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 group by CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER order by sum(CRRD_FINANCETIMEEXCEEDED) desc for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store max. 10 rows with highest sum(CRRD_FINANCETIMEEXCEEDED)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CRRD_BALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CRRD_DISPUTES) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CRRD_DSO1) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CRRD_DSO2) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only

select cast(sum(CRRD_DISPUTES) as decimal(13,2)), CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER, min(CRRD_HADR_NAME1), min(CRRD_HADR_CITY), min(CRRD_HADR_COUNTRY) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 group by CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER order by sum(CRRD_DISPUTES) desc for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store max. 10 rows with highest sum(CRRD_DISPUTES)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CRRD_BALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CRRD_FINANCETIMEEXCEEDED) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CRRD_DSO1) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CRRD_DSO2) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only

select cast(sum(CRRD_DSO1) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CRRD_DSO2) as decimal(13,2)), CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER, min(CRRD_HADR_NAME1), min(CRRD_HADR_CITY), min(CRRD_HADR_COUNTRY) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 group by CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER order by case when sum(CRRD_DSO2) <> 0 then sum(CRRD_DSO1) / sum(CRRD_DSO2) else sum(CRRD_DSO1) end desc for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store max. 10 rows with highest sum (CRRD_DSO1) / sum (CRRD_DSO2)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CRRD_BALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CRRD_FINANCETIMEEXCEEDED) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CRRD_DISPUTES) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CRRD where CRRD_CRRR_NO = :2 and CRRD_INGCOMFIN_NUMBER_OWNER = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC * (days(':3') - days(INVO_INVDATE))) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 for fetch only
select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBB where DEBB_ADMNO = :2 and DEBB_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: -- At the end of BID740 program BXA740 is submitted to create the XML file
